00026 class Object: public Function {
00027     public:
00029         typedef std::vector<unsigned> uintvec1D;
00031         typedef std::vector<uintvec1D> uintvec2D;
00032 
00033         Object (const QString &, unsigned, unsigned);
00034         virtual ~Object () { }
00035         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00036                              double, double, double,
00037                              double, double, double);
00038 
00039         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00040                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00041                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00042         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00043         virtual void Draw (void);
00044 
00045     protected:
00047         unsigned NumVertices;
00049         unsigned NumSurfaces;
00050 
00051         vec4vec1D X;        
00052         vec4vec1D Xtrans;   
00053         vec3vec1D Xscr;     
00054 
00057         floatvec1D R;
00060         floatvec1D G;
00063         floatvec1D B;
00064 
00066         uintvec2D Surface;
00067 
00072         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double) { return F; }
00073 };

00080 class Hypercube: public Object {
00081 public:
00082     Hypercube (): Object ("Hypercube", 16, 24) {
00083         parameterNames.push_back("Size");
00084     }
00085     Hypercube (double _a, const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0., 0., 0.));
00086     virtual ~Hypercube() { }
00087 
00088     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00089         a = _a; }
00090 
00091     virtual std::string description () {
00092         std::ostringstream out;
00093         out << "Hypercube (a = " << a << ")" << std::ends;
00094         return out.str ();
00095     }
00096 protected:
00097     virtual void Initialize();
00098     void DeclareSquare (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00099 
00100     double a;
00101     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00102 };

00125 class Sponge: public Hypercube {
00126 public:
00128 
00138     Sponge (unsigned _level = 1, int _distance = 1, double _rad = 1,
00139             VecMath::Vector<4> _center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0.,0., 0.));
00140     virtual ~Sponge ();
00141 
00142     virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00143                             double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00144                             double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00145     virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00146     virtual void Draw (void);
00147 
00151     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double _c = 0,
00152                                 double = 0) {
00153         Level = (unsigned)_a;
00154         distance = (int)_b;
00155         rad = _c;
00156     }
00157 
00159     virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00160                          double, double, double,
00161                          double, double, double) {
00162         List.clear();
00163         Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00164     }
00165 
00167     virtual std::string description () {
00168         std::ostringstream out;
00169         out << "Sponge (level = " << Level << ")" << std::ends;
00170         return out.str ();
00171     }
00172 
00173 protected:
00174     virtual void Initialize();
00175     virtual unsigned long MemRequired (unsigned);
00176     unsigned Level;                 
00177 
00179 
00180     std::vector<Hypercube *> List;
00181 
00182     int distance;                   
00183     double rad;                     
00184     VecMath::Vector<4> center;      
00185 };

00218 class Gasket: public Pyramid {
00219     public:
00220         Gasket (unsigned level = 1, double rad = 1,
00221                 VecMath::Vector<4> Center = VecMath::Vector<4> (0., 0.,0., 0.));
00222         virtual ~Gasket() { }
00223 
00224         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00225                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00226                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00227         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00228         virtual void Draw (void);
00229         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0,
00230                                     double = 0, double = 0) {
00231             Level = (unsigned)_a;
00232             rad = _b;
00233         }
00234         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00235                              double, double, double,
00236                              double, double, double) {
00237             List.clear();
00238             Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00239         }
00240 
00241     protected:
00242         virtual void Initialize();
00243         virtual unsigned long MemRequired (void);
00244         unsigned Level;
